filterGuide.title: How to Choose the Right Filter
filterGuide.content: Choosing the right filter depends on tank size and bioload. Use our filter calculator to determine required flow rate, and choose a filter that meets or exceeds this rate. For planted tanks, prefer lower flow rates to avoid disturbing plants.

heaterGuide.title: Heater Selection Guide
heaterGuide.content: The basic rule is 1 watt per liter of water. If room temperature is low or you need significant temperature rise, add 2-3 extra watts per liter per degree Celsius. Use our heater calculator for precise recommendations.

waterGuide.title: Water Quality Standards
waterGuide.content: Maintain optimal water parameters: pH 6.5-7.5, Ammonia 0 ppm, Nitrite 0 ppm, Nitrate below 20 ppm. Test water weekly and change 25-30% every two weeks. Use water conditioners to remove chlorine and heavy metals.

actions.title: How you can help
actions.water: Keep water changes mindful and dispose responsibly.
actions.energy: Pick efficient filters and heaters to save energy.
actions.plants: Lean on live plants to polish water naturally.
actions.reuse: Give spare gear a second life by donating locally.

guide.title: Eco-friendly aquarium guide
guide.intro: Small choices add up to a calmer tank and a lighter footprint.

water.title: Water
water.body: Plan partial changes, dechlorinate gently, and reuse water for houseplants when you can.

energy.title: Energy
energy.body: Choose efficient filters and heaters; aim for timers and thermostats to avoid wasted watts.

plants.title: Plants
plants.body: Fast growers like pothos and stem plants help with natural filtration and oxygen.

disposal.title: Disposal
disposal.body: Never drain to natural waterways and avoid harsh chemicals down the sink.

themes.title: Themes
themes.subtitle: Pick a mood that fits your aquarium story

q1.question: How do I choose the right size?
q1.answer: Use our free calculators to determine the ideal size based on your tank volume and requirements.

q2.question: What is the warranty period?
q2.answer: All our products come with manufacturer warranty. Duration varies by brand and product.

q3.question: Is shipping free?
q3.answer: Yes, free shipping on orders over 100,000 IQD.

q4.question: Can I return this product?
q4.answer: Yes, you have 14 days to return the product if it's not suitable.

errors.required: Please add your name and question

1.author: Ali
1.question: Can I use this filter with shrimp tanks?
1.answer: Yes. Keep intake covered with a sponge pre-filter to protect shrimp.

2.author: Sara
2.question: What’s the recommended maintenance interval?
2.answer: Rinse mechanical media every 2–3 weeks and replace chemical media monthly.
